title: Second Chances
description: A Second Chance at love, a second chance at normal that is what Zoey thought she was getting when her mother moved her and her younger sister Lily across the country to be closer to relatives after their fathers unexpected sudden death. At least that was the reason their mother gave them but things become more clear after the move was made and Zoey finds the main reason behind it all. Will Zoey be able to forgive her mother and have a second chance at their relationship. Without friends Zoey may not have been able to get passed the devastation and heartache of her mothers betrayal. Through the struggles Zoey finds love but will it last?Show more Show less
author: C.A. Harms
